name: SNONG V 1.0
description:
Have you ever wanted to see pong and snake together? Well, this is your ideal game. Try to get as many points as possible without crashing, let them slip the ball or hitting the snake on the head. The game can be more fun if you play it with someone.

Pong Paddle: Go Up: W

Go Down: S

Snake: Move: w, a, s, d
